src:
Trio Iwan Bule, Iwan Budianto, dan Cucu Somantri Diharap Bisa Lekas Bekerja
02 Nov 2019, 17:45 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Kementerian Pemuda dan Olahraga (Kemenpora) memberi tanggapan resmi mereka terkait terpilihnya Ketua Umum dan Wakil Ketua Umum PSSI, pada Kongres Luar Biasa PSSI, Sabtu (02/11/2019). Mereka berharap trio Mochamad Iriawan, Iwan Budianto, dan Cucu Somantri bisa segera bekerja.
"Kami berharap mereka bisa segera tancap gas," kata Sekretaris Kemenpora (Sesmenpora), Gatot S Dewa Broto, dalam rilis resmi Kemenpora, Sabtu (02/11).
"Dalam sambutan Menpora, kala membuka KLB, disebutkan di antaranya bahwa Presiden Jokowi sangat berpesan agar Pengurus PSSI segera bergerak cepat mempersiapkan tim nasional," sambungnya.
Menurut Gatot, Kemenpora berharap agar kerja sama antara mereka dan PSSI bisa terjalin baik pada periode kepengurusan ini. Hal tersebut, sambungnya, demi sepak bola Indonesia.
"Kemenpora membuka pintu lebar-lebar bagi pengurus PSSI untuk bekerja lebih cepat dan komprehensif bagi kemajuan sepak bola nasional," tuturnya.
Sebelumnya, Iwan Bule dipastikan terpilih sebagai Ketua Umum PSSI. Dalam pemilihan di ajang Kongres Luar Biasa, yang digelar di Jakarta, Sabtu (02/11/2019), ia menang telak dari para pesaingnya.
Pada pemilihan ini, dari 85 voter, Iwan mendapat 82 suara. Sementara, Arif Putra Wicaksono dan para calon lainnya tak mendapat satu pun suara. Tiga suara lain dianggap tidak sah.
Pemilihan Ketua Umum ini sendiri hanya diikuti tiga calon saja. Selain Iwan Bule, ada sosok Arif Putra Wicaksono dan Rahim Soekasah. Sementara, tujuh calon lain -termasuk La Nyalla Mattalitti- sudah mengundurkan diri.
Sebagai pendamping Ketua Umum, terpilihlah Iwan Budianto dan Cucu Somantri sebagai wakil. Iwan mendapat 74 suara, sedangkan Cucu mendapat 81 suara.
Simak artikel selengkapnya di bawah ini.
text:
Trio Iwan Bule, Iwan Budianto, and Somantri's grandchildren are expected to work quickly
02 Nov 2019, 17:45 by Bola.net
Bola.net - The Ministry of Youth and Sports (Kemenpora) gave their official response regarding the election of the General Chair and Vice Chair of the PSSI, at the Extraordinary Congress of PSSI, Saturday (02/11/2019). They hoped that the trio of Mochamad Iriawan, Iwan Budianto, and Cucu Somantri could soon work.
"We hope they can immediately step on the gas," said Secretary of the Ministry of Youth and Sports (Sesmenpora), Gatot S Dewa Broto, in an official release of the Ministry of Youth and Sports, Saturday (02/11).
"In the Menpora speech, when opening the KLB, it was mentioned among them that President Jokowi strongly advised that the PSSI Management immediately move quickly to prepare the national team," he continued.
According to Gatot, Kemenpora hopes that the collaboration between them and PSSI can be established well in this management period. This, he continued, for the sake of Indonesian football.
"The Ministry of Youth and Sports opens wide doors for the management of PSSI to work faster and more comprehensively for the progress of national football," he said.
Previously, Iwan Bule was certain to be elected as the General Chair of PSSI. In the election at the Extraordinary Congress event, which was held in Jakarta, Saturday (02/11/2019), he won a landslide victory over his competitors.
In this election, from 85 voters, Iwan got 82 votes. Meanwhile, Arif Putra Wicaksono and the other candidates did not get any votes. Three other votes are considered invalid.
The election of the Chairperson itself was only followed by three candidates. In addition to Iwan Bule, there are figures of Arif Putra Wicaksono and Rahim Soekasah. Meanwhile, seven other candidates - including La Nyalla Mattalitti - have resigned.
As a companion to the General Chair, Iwan Budianto and Cucu Somantri were chosen as representatives. Iwan got 74 votes, while Cucu got 81 votes.
